wikipedia_page.main: Reece Beckles-Richards (born 19 July 1995) is an Antigua and Barbudan international footballer who plays as a striker for Cheshunt. He has also had spells at Aldershot Town, Woking, Kingstonian, Wingate & Finchley and Wealdstone.

response: *Reece Beckles-Richards (born 1995), Antigua and Barbudan international footballer
